item.title: Mostly Cloudy and 78 F at Mobile, Mobile Regional Airport, AL
item.description: Winds are from the Southwest at 18.4 gusting to 34.5 MPH (16 gusting to 30 KT). The pressure is 1007.2 mb and the humidity is 82%. Last Updated on Apr 24 2021, 2:56 pm CDT.
